channel.title: Possible Smuggled Blocks
channel.description:
A few weeks ago I went to solve a report on some grief near the World 2 spawn. While I was there I found this:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/8HbXr.png[/img]
The mossy block running around the side can only be found in strongholds. When I asked Herobrine about it he said that upon expansion in World 2 he found two small rooms of the blocks and nothing else. For anyone who hasn't been to one of the strongholds they are huge mazes of corridors and rooms with the walls lined of these and a few other blocks.
To me it seems highly unlikely that a stronghold that spawned has just been cut down to two small rooms. So when I asked him to show me the place he found them, he had conveniently forgotten where. I didn't take them from him since I had no definitive proof that he had taken them from creative, but i said to hide them in a chest so no one else can take them.
Mitb if you (or Tom/Zuppers) could check his chests to see if he has smuggled anything else from creative then hopefully this can be resolved without the economy being wrecked by probable smugled items.

item.title: Possible Smuggled Blocks
item.dc:creator: @zuppers zuppers
item.description:
@zuppers wrote:

They could have been smuggled before it was fixed right?

Read full topic

my money is on the possibility that he smuggled the blocks

Read full topic

item.title: Possible Smuggled Blocks
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Is that even possible? Does he know where the stronghold was?

Read full topic
